select distinct perm_nt_no, cgg_code, snt_cob_code, yy, upso_sno, snt_cob_nm, To_Char(perm_nt_ymd,'YYYYMMDD'), upso_nm, site_addr_rd, site_addr, upso_site_telno, bup_nm, To_Char(site_stdt,'YYYYMMDD'), admdng_nm, To_Char(dcb_ymd,'YYYYMMDD'), dcb_gbn_nm, dcb_why, snt_uptae_nm, ge_eh_yn, site_loc_gbn, trdp_area_etc from biz_a where upso_nm like '%'||#{upso_nm}||'%' and site_addr like '%'||#{site_addr}||'%'
union
select distinct perm_nt_no, cgg_code, snt_cob_code, yy, upso_sno, snt_cob_nm, To_Char(perm_nt_ymd,'YYYYMMDD'), upso_nm, site_addr_rd, site_addr, upso_site_telno, bup_nm, To_Char(site_stdt,'YYYYMMDD'), admdng_nm, To_Char(dcb_ymd,'YYYYMMDD'), dcb_gbn_nm, dcb_why, snt_uptae_nm, ge_eh_yn, site_loc_gbn, trdp_area_etc from biz_a where upso_nm like '%'||#{site_addr}||'%' and site_addr like '%'||#{upso_nm}||'%'

select distinct perm_nt_no, cgg_code, snt_cob_code, yy, upso_sno, snt_cob_nm, To_Char(perm_nt_ymd,'YYYYMMDD'), upso_nm, site_addr_rd, site_addr, upso_site_telno, bup_nm, To_Char(site_stdt,'YYYYMMDD'), admdng_nm, To_Char(dcb_ymd,'YYYYMMDD'), dcb_gbn_nm, dcb_why, snt_uptae_nm, ge_eh_yn, site_loc_gbn, trdp_area_etc from biz_a where upso_nm like '%'||#{keyword1}||'%'

select upso_nm, site_addr from ( select upso_nm, site_addr, rownum from (select distinct perm_nt_no, upso_nm, site_addr from biz_a where UPSO_NM like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and DCB_GBN_NM is null) ) where rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 10
